title: Litro opens terminal, but suspends distribution
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Kerawalapitiya gas storage terminal which was closed due to the New Year was re-opened on Monday (18).
Litro Gas informed that domestic gas cylinders will NOT be distributed on Monday (18).
Further, Litro said that gas will only be issued for commercial purposes.
In addition, Litro said that a vessel carrying gas will be arriving in the country on Monday (18) & gas will be distributed to the local market from Tuesday (19).
Court re-issues summons on Cabraal; Travel ban extended to 2nd May ’22
